content: the fiorentina hooded scarf is a great project to keep you warm in the colder months it s a versatile pattern that can be adapted to your taste it s very easy to follow with a lot of customisation options it is comes in us terms and with lots and lots of very helpful pictures level - easy materials approximately 600 m - 800 m 675- 874 yards of aran weight size 4 or doubled fingering yarn size 1 - the amount of yarn needed will vary depending on the preferred size 7 or 8 mm hook tapestry needle measuring tape gauge because this pattern is mostly based on measurements and not on row counts gauge is not very important pick the yarn and the hook that gives you the fabric that you want by making a gauge swatch if you want a thick chunky scarf use a smaller hook 6 or 7 mm or thicker yarn if you d prefer a more flowy and think scarf use a bigger hook 8 or 9 mm the pattern comes in two very adaptable adult sizes s l please contact me if you need any clarification or if you have any questions regarding the pattern you can find me on instagram @nomadstitches ***this pattern is for personal use i do not authorise the sale or distribution of the pattern itself or the pictures in it the finished item may be sold or distributed however i ask for it to be recognised as a nomad stitches design thank you ***
